english.segment1: A double minded one. Gazing into two reflections. Who cannot recognize. The vessel or the messenger
english.segment3: Obedience gone and somewhere. Left in the distance. New wilderness. Outstretched hand, broken wrist. Just a little taste of everything you would miss. Could you turn your back on this?
english.segment4: Fight, (fight). For our tomorrow. Fall, (to stand). Surrender, to follow (2x)
english.segment5: Whoa. It's all. All we'll ever have. Whoa. It's all. All we'll ever need
english.segment6: From somewhere far, far away: (I Will avenge, I will repay). A distant voice from some familiar place. (Drive it home in me, pull it out from me). "Let go the anchor. Let got the deadweight. (I will repay, I will avenge), And I'll change what's in remiss"
english.segment7: Fight, (fight). For our tomorrow. Fall, (to stand). Surrender, to follow (2x)
english.segment8: Whoa. It's all. All we'll ever have. Whoa. It's all. All we'll ever need
english.segment9: Will I find home in. This beautiful oblivion?. No meaning. No solace. No comfort. No justice. These thoughts I've held in failure. My paper champion, false savior
english.segment10: "You think the answer lies within. When your heart betrays you?"
english.segment11: Oh yeah, yeah. Oh yeah, yeah
english.segment12: From somewhere far, far away: (I Will avenge, I will repay). A distant voice from some familiar place. (Drive it home in me, pull it out from me). "Let go the anchor. Let got the deadweight. (I will repay, I will avenge), And I'll change what's in remiss"
english.segment13: Fight, (fight). For our tomorrow. Fall, (to stand). Surrender, to follow (2x)
english.segment14: Whoa. It's all. All we'll ever have. Whoa. It's all. All we'll ever need
english.segment15: It's all. All we'll ever have. It's all. All we'll ever need (2x).
